trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] This class is used to represent the list of child activities for a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]這個類別用來代表<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>子活動清單

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Only call methods derived from <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601> and not <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>, such as using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.Add%2A> to add activities instead of <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.AddRange%2A>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 只呼叫衍生自方法<xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>而非<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>，例如使用<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.Add%2A>要加入活動而不是<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.AddRange%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.AddRange%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IList%601>

trans-unit.source: Calling methods derived from <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> will have unexpected consequences.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫衍生自方法<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>會有非預期的結果。</xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>

trans-unit.source: Implements an enumeration interface to the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>的列舉介面

trans-unit.source: Enumerators only enable reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值只能夠讀取集合中的資料。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use enumerators to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用列舉值修改基礎集合。

trans-unit.source: To begin, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> also brings the enumerator back to this position.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>也會列舉值帶回至這個位置。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>

trans-unit.source: At this position, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 在這個位置上，呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you must call <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，您必須呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>前進的第一個元素之前讀取<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>值集合的列舉值</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> returns the same object until either <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>會傳回相同的物件直到<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A>稱為。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> sets <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> to the next element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>設定<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>下一個項目。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A></xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the end of the collection is passed, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection, and calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 集合的末端後，列舉程式會放置在集合中，最後一個元素之後和呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the last call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> returned `false`, calling <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果最後一個呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>傳回`false`，則呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>引發例外狀況。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: To set `Current` to the first element of the collection again, you can call `Reset` followed by <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定`Current`集合一次的第一個元素，您可以呼叫`Reset`後面加上<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 只要集合維持不變，列舉程式就持續有效。

trans-unit.source: If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying or deleting elements, the enumerator is irreversibly invalidated and the next call to <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> or `Reset` raises an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> .
trans-unit.target: 如果對集合進行變更，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉程式會將失效，而且下次呼叫<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>或`Reset`引發<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the collection is modified between <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A> and <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>, <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> will return the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated.
trans-unit.target: 如果之間修改集合<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>和<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>，<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A>將傳回的項目設定為，，即使列舉值已經無效。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取因此，列舉集合在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改集合。

trans-unit.source: This causes the enumerator to raise an exception.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致引發例外狀況的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可逐一查看的列舉值<xref href="System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection>委派，必須識別處理事件的方法。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection>

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is synchronized, that is thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否存取<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>同步處理時，也就是安全執行緒。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> returns an object, which can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>傳回的物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601></xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的集合中的類別<xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間也實作`Synchronized`方法，這會提供基礎集合周圍同步處理的包裝函式。</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並不是安全執行緒程序。

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 即使集合經過同步化，其他的執行緒仍可修改該集合，使列舉值擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is synchronized, that is, thread-safe; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果存取<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>同步處理時，也就是安全執行緒，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: For collections whose underlying store is not publicly available, the expected implementation is to return the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 對於不會公開其基礎存放區的集合，所預期的實作會傳回目前的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Note that the pointer to the current instance might not be sufficient for collections that wrap other collections; those should return the underlying collection <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 請注意目前的執行個體的指標可能無法完全包裝其他集合，集合這些集合應該傳回基礎集合<xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: Most collection classes in the <xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName> namespace also implement a `Synchronized` method, which provides a synchronized wrapper around the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的集合中的類別<xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>命名空間也實作`Synchronized`方法，這會提供基礎集合周圍同步處理的包裝函式。</xref:System.Collections?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the collection using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，在衍生的類別可以提供自己的集合的同步化的版本<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: The synchronizing code must perform operations on the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A> property of the collection, not directly on the collection.
trans-unit.target: 同步處理的程式碼必須在上執行作業<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>集合，而不是直接在集合的屬性。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCollection.System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: 這可確保衍生自其他物件的集合正常運作。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the collection instance.
trans-unit.target: 具體而言，保持正常的同步處理與其他可能同時修改集合執行個體的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>.
trans-unit.target: 物件，可用來同步處理存取具備<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that iterates through the underlying <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>可逐一查看基礎<xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> only allows for reading the data in the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>只允許讀取集合中的資料。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: You cannot use an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> to modify the underlying collection.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>來修改基礎集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>，可用來逐一查看集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Adds an object to the <xref:System.Collections.IList> at the end of the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 將物件加入至<xref:System.Collections.IList><xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>結尾</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to add to the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>若要加入至<xref:System.Collections.IList>。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Int32>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Int32>.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Object> that was just added.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Object>剛加入。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes all <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 移除所有<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>從<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Object> is a member of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Object>集合的成員。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to locate in the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要在<xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>中尋找</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Returns if value is in the collection; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 傳回如果 value 存在於集合中; 否則 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Object> in the underlying activities collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得以零為起始的索引<xref:System.Object>基礎活動集合中。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to be indexed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>要編製索引。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the value in the underlying activities collection or -1 if not found in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引 value 基礎活動集合或-1 中找不到集合中。

trans-unit.source: The value is not of type and the exception object contains "Error_InvalidListItem" error message.
trans-unit.target: value 的類型不是和例外狀況物件包含"Error_InvalidListItem"的錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Inserts an <xref:System.Object> into the <xref:System.Collections.IList> at the zero-based index specified.
trans-unit.target: 插入<xref:System.Object>到<xref:System.Collections.IList>指定之以零為起始的索引。</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based position of the insertion.
trans-unit.target: 插入的以零為起始的位置。

trans-unit.source: The object to insert.
trans-unit.target: 要插入的物件。

trans-unit.source: It must be of type <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 它必須是型別<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Collections.IList>有固定的大小。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements.
trans-unit.target: 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後，但允許修改現有的項目後新增或移除項目。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Collections.IList>有固定大小，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>處於唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Boolean><xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601> is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean><xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref:System.Collections.Generic.ICollection%601>是唯讀，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> based on the index.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定活動中<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>根據索引。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Zero-based index into the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>.
trans-unit.target: 以零為起始的索引至<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Object>, a member activity of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>, whose index in the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> was specified in the call.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Object>，成員活動<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>中, 其索引<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>呼叫中指定。</xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: 從<xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList>移除第一個出現的特定物件

trans-unit.source: The elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot.
trans-unit.target: 移除項的項目會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to remove from the <xref:System.Collections.IList>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>若要移除<xref:System.Collections.IList>.</xref:System.Collections.IList> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IList> is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>處於唯讀狀態。</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Collections.IList> has a fixed size.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IList>具有固定的大小。</xref:System.Collections.IList>
